General.Name: Everest Industries Limited
General.Description: Everest Industries Limited manufactures and trades in building products for residential, commercial, and industrial sectors in India. It operates through Building Products and Steel Buildings segments. The company offers roofing products, such as fiber cement roofing sheets, super color roofing sheets, Hi-tech roofing sheets, and EPDM washers; fences and gates; pre-fabricated buildings; boards, panels, and other building products and accessories; and heavy duty boards, rapicon panels, cement wood planks, fibre cement boards, planks, and artewoods, as well as building solutions comprising ceiling, walls, flooring, and cladding products. It also provides manufactures and erects pre-engineered and smart steel buildings and related accessories. The company serves wide range of customers, including corporates, wholesalers, distributors, architects, interior designers, influencers, homeowners, and other businesses. It exports its products to 15 countries. The company was incorporated in 1934 and is headquartered in Mumbai, India. Everest Industries Limited operates as a subsidiary of Falak Investment Pvt. Ltd.
